src/tagfs_db.c

00001 #include "tagfs_debug.h"
00002 #include "tagfs_common.h"
00003 #include "tagfs_db.h"
00004 
00005 #include <string.h>
00006 #include <sqlite3.h>
00007 
00008 static int db_enable_foreign_keys(sqlite3 *conn) {
00009         char *error_msg = NULL;
00010         char enable_foreign_keys[] = "PRAGMA foreign_keys = ON";
00011         int error = 0;
00012 
00013         assert(conn != NULL);
00014 
00015         error = sqlite3_exec(conn, enable_foreign_keys, NULL, NULL, &error_msg);
00016 
00017         if(error != SQLITE_OK) {
00018                 ERROR("A problem occured while configuring the database: %s", error_msg);
00019                 sqlite3_free(error_msg);
00020         }
00021 
00022         return error;
00023 } /* db_enable_foreign_keys */
00024 
00025 static sqlite3 *db_connect() {
00026         int error = 0;
00027         sqlite3 *conn = NULL;
00028 
00029         error = sqlite3_open_v2(TAGFS_DATA->dbpath, &conn, SQLITE_OPEN_READWRITE, NULL); /* TODO: set as 'SQLITE_OPEN_READWRITE | SQLITE_OPEN_CREATE' and create the database if it does not exist already */
00030         assert(conn != NULL);
00031 
00032         if(error != SQLITE_OK) { /* if no space on drive or file does not exist */
00033                 ERROR("An error occurred when connecting to the database: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(conn));
00034         }
00035         
00036         (void)db_enable_foreign_keys(conn);
00037 
00038         return conn;
00039 } /* db_connect */
00040 
00041 static int db_disconnect(sqlite3 *conn) {
00042         int error = 0;
00043 
00044         assert(conn != NULL);
00045 
00046         error = sqlite3_close(conn);
00047 
00048         if(error != SQLITE_OK) /* has pending operations or prepared statements to be free'd */ {
00049                 ERROR("A problem occured while disconnecting from the database: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(conn));
00050         }
00051 
00052         return error;
00053 } /* db_disconnect */
00054 
00055 void db_create_table() {
00056         char *create_query = NULL;
00057         char query[] = "CREATE TABLE \"thread_\" (\"file_id\" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL)";
00058         int create_query_length = 0;
00059         int rc = 0;
00060         sqlite3 *conn = NULL;
00061         sqlite3_stmt *res = NULL;
00062         unsigned int tid = pthread_self();
00063 
00064         DEBUG("Creating table: thread_%u", tid);
00065 
00066         create_query_length = strlen(query) + num_digits(tid);
00067         DEBUG("Create query length is %d", create_query_length);
00068         create_query = malloc(create_query_length * sizeof(*create_query) + 1);
00069         assert(create_query != NULL);
00070         snprintf(create_query, create_query_length + 1, "CREATE TABLE \"thread_%u\" (\"file_id\" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL)", tid);
00071         DEBUG("Create query: %s", create_query);
00072 
00073         conn = db_connect();
00074         (void)sqlite3_prepare_v2(conn, create_query, strlen(create_query), &res, NULL);
00075         assert(create_query != NULL);
00076         free(create_query);
00077         create_query = NULL;
00078 
00079         rc = sqlite3_step(res);
00080 
00081         (void)sqlite3_finalize(res);
00082         (void)db_disconnect(conn);
00083 
00084         if(rc == SQLITE_DONE) {
00085                 DEBUG("Table \"thread_%u\"created successfully.", tid);
00086         }
00087         else {
00088                 ERROR("Table creation FAILED for \"thread_%u\" with result code %d", tid, rc);
00089         }
00090 } /* db_create_table */
